comments.body:
It does not look like the `license_file` is included in the source distribution since `LICENSE` is missing from the `MANIFEST.in`. You can manually include it:

https://conda-forge.org/docs/meta.html#packaging-the-license-manually

and add an issue upstream and add the url as a comment in the `meta.yaml`. Then just include it in future updates to the feedstock when the issue is resolved upstream.
I am including it in the next build, thanks.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +34,38 @@  license: MPL-2.0
  license_family: OTHER
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'A Python module to read and plot Galaxy RNA-seq data'
